code: export var getTheme=function getTheme(){return localStorage.getItem('application-theme')||'dark';};export var setTheme=function setTheme(theme){localStorage.setItem('application-theme',theme);if(theme==='dark'){document.body.classList.add('dark');document.body.classList.remove('light');}else{document.body.classList.add('light');document.body.classList.remove('dark');}};
